entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
